src_original: catvāra ime śāriputramaudgalyāyanau brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavanti;  katame catvāraḥ? 1)
yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;  ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate; 2)  punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe caturdiśasya bhikṣusaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ sandhatte;  ayaṃ tritīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
